title: "A Psychologist Reveals 2 Dangers Of Falling For An AI Girlfriend"
excerpt: "AI girlfriends are chatbots, powered by large language models like GPT-3, or more recently, GPT-4, that can simulate coherent and diverse conversations through voice, text or images. These are virtual companions that users can “train” to be their ideal girlfriends."
